entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 6. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023
